Review Text: this leave in conditioner is easy to use. sprayed on damp hair, it is an effective detangler. sprayed on both dry and damp hair, it does provide some softness and moisture to dry, over processed hair. My hair is fine and color treated and is frequently subjected to heat from dryers and curling irons. This did leave it feeling soft and looking healthy. However it didn't do much to refresh my style and the fragrance is strong. It is not an unpleasant aroma, sweet like baby powder and light musk, but not my favorite. It is strong and it lasts all day. The bottle tucks easily into a bag or briefcase and the spray functions smoothly. I wish it either had a difference scent or was fragrance free. I appreciate the exclusion of mineral oil, petrolaltum or artificial coloring. It is an effective product that provides relief to stressed locks.

REVLON
['Root Erase by ColorSilk -Erases roots and grays for beautiful, seamless color in 10 minutes -Unique ColorSilk Precise Control sponge applicator for drip-free, superior controlNEW! Root Erase by ColorSilk erases away unsightly roots and grays with ease to keep your haircolor looking its best for longer. Only Revlon has the unique Precise Control sponge applicator that works like an eraser to easily glide on hair drip-free, and with superior control so that color can be applied precisely to the root areas. No messy bowls or clumsy brushes. Permanent color blends seamlessly so you can keep your haircolor always looking fresh and beautiful. Ammonia-Free. 100% gray coverage. Available in a range of 12 shades. Matches any brand, even salon color.']
{'Color': 'Dark Blonde 61', 'Brand': 'REVLON', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Full Cure Time': '10 Minutes', 'Package Dimensions': '6.2 x 2.7 x 2.1 inches; 0.35 Ounces', 'Item model number': '2446-61', 'UPC': '309972446619 885222320156', 'Manufacturer': 'Revlon'}
As usual my hairdresser left me in the lurch and cancelled my touch up.  I was not happy as I was leaving for a trip with some important meetings the next day.  I could live without the cut but not the roots.  In desperation I purchased this product and boy was I pleased. The kit comes with directions, the usual skimpy gloves, a small bottle of color and activator.  It mixes easily.  The sponge applicator provides good control.  The product sits for ten minutes (fifteen if you have hard to color hair or alot of gray), rinse out, shampoo and style. Initially I was concerned that the color was too dark but it was great, blended beautifully with my expensive salon color.  It looked as good as what I get at the salon and without the attitude and expense. Recommended.

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** Strong preference for at-home hair color solutions, especially for root touch-ups and gray coverage, as well as effective leave-in conditioners for maintaining hair health.
- **Product Quality:** Values high-quality results that match salon treatments without the associated costs or appointments, appreciating products that repair damage and restore softness.
- **Ease of Use:** Prefers products that are easy to apply, with features enhancing control, such as spray applicators for conditioning products, and sponge applicators for color treatments.
- **Time Efficiency:** Looks for quick processing times, favoring products that deliver noticeable results in minimal time (e.g., 10-15 minutes for color products).
- **Color Matching:** Ensures that at-home color blends well with previously applied dyes, particularly salon colors.
- **Practicality Over Luxury:** Prioritizes functionality and effectiveness over brand prestige or elaborate packaging, showing satisfaction with product performance even if minor flaws are present, like strong fragrances.
- **User Experience:** Positive past experiences encourage repeat purchases and recommendations, highlighting satisfaction with product effectiveness, whether for color maintenance or restoration of over-processed hair. 

The user appreciates natural ingredients and effectiveness in managing both color-treated and damaged hair, demonstrating a balanced approach to hair care that values health and conditions alongside color solutions.
